org.ggp.base.player.gamer.statemachine.sample

Class SampleGamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ggp.base.player.gamer.Gamer
      • org.ggp.base.player.gamer.statemachine.StateMachineGamer
        • org.ggp.base.player.gamer.statemachine.sample.SampleGamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FabulousMultiPlayer, FabulousMultiPlayer2, FabulousPlayer, FabulousSinglePlayer, FabulousSinglePlayer2, SampleLegalGamer, SampleMonteCarloGamer, SampleNoopGamer

    public abstract class SampleGamer
extends StateMachineGamer
    SampleGamer is a simplified version of the StateMachineGamer, dropping some advanced functionality so the example gamers can be presented concisely.
